mapper.insert: insert into rdos_engine_job_cache( job_id, engine_type, compute_type, stage, job_info, node_address, job_name, job_priority, job_resource) values(#{jobId}, #{engineType}, #{computeType}, #{stage}, #{jobInfo}, #{nodeAddress},#{jobName},#{jobPriority},#{jobResource});
mapper.select: select * from rdos_engine_job_cache where job_id=#{jobId} and is_deleted=0 order by gmt_create desc limit 1;
mapper.update: update rdos_engine_job_cache set node_address = #{nodeAddress}, stage = #{stage}, job_priority = #{jobPriority}, is_failover = 0, gmt_modified=now() where job_id = #{jobId}
mapper.select: select * from rdos_engine_job_cache where id > #{startId} and is_failover = 1 and (node_address = #{nodeAddress} or node_address is null) and stage = #{stage} and is_deleted=0 order by id, job_priority asc limit 500;
select job_name from rdos_engine_job_cache where job_name like '%${jobName}%' and is_deleted=0;
SELECT DISTINCT(node_address) as nodeAddress FROM rdos_engine_job_cache WHERE is_deleted = 0
